Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if UseCD then
UseCD = false print("Cooldowns disabled!")
else
UseCD = true print("Cooldowns enabled!")
end end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) then return true end

Ability.Name: USE: Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 1
Ability.Lua: local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end

Ability.Name: All:Firestone
Ability.Lua:
local _,enchant,_,_,_,_,_,_ = GetWeaponEnchantInfo()
if enchant == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(55158) == false and GetItemCount("Grand Firestone") >= 1 then UseItemByName("Grand Firestone","player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end end

Ability.Name: All:Create Firestone
Ability.Lua: if GetItemCount("Grand Firestone") == 0 and GetItemCount("Soul Shard") >= 1 and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(60220) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Fel Armor
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",47893) ~= nil then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: D:Imp
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(688) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Felhunter
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(691) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Death Coil
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") <= 50 and IsSpellInRange("Death Coil", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Life Tap
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") <= 20 and 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") >= 50 then return true end

Ability.Name: DR/DM:Curse of Doom
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and UnitDebuffID("target",47867, "player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Curse of Doom", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: DR/DM:Immolate
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target",47811, "player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Immolate", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47811) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Chaos Bolt
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Chaos Bolt", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(59172) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Conflagrate
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Incinerate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Incinerate
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Incinerate", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47838) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: DR/DM:Curse of the Elements
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 and UnitDebuffID("target", 60433) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target", 51161) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target",47865) == nil and IsSpellInRange("Curse of the Elements", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Curse of Agony
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 47864, "player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Shadow Bolt", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Haunt
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Haunt", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(59164) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Unstable Affliction
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 47843, "player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Unstable Affliction", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47843) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Shadow Bolt
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Shadow Bolt", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47809) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Shadow Bolt (Debuff)
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 17800) == nil and IsSpellInRange("Shadow Bolt", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47809) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: A:Drain Soul
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 25 and IsSpellInRange("Drain Soul", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(8288) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Life Tap (Buff)
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 63321) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Seed of Corruption
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Seed of Corruption", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47836) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Soulshatter
Ability.Lua: if UnitThreatSituation("player") == 3 and GetItemCount("Soul Shard") >= 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: All:Spellstone
Ability.Lua:
local _,enchant,_,_,_,_,_,_ = GetWeaponEnchantInfo()
if enchant == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(55194) == false and GetItemCount("Grand Spellstone") >= 1 then UseItemByName("Grand Spellstone","player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end end

Ability.Name: All:Create Spellstone
Ability.Lua: if GetItemCount("Grand Spellstone") == 0 and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47888) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: DM/A:Corruption
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 47813, "player") == nil and IsSpellInRange("Incinerate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Immolation Aura
DM:Metamorphosis
DM:Shadow Bolt
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Shadow Bolt", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47809) == false then RunMacroText("/use Demonic Empowerment") RunMacroText("/script UIErrorsFrame:Clear()") return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Shadow Bolt (Debuff)
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 17800) == nil and IsSpellInRange("Shadow Bolt", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47809) == false then RunMacroText("/use Demonic Empowerment") RunMacroText("/script UIErrorsFrame:Clear()") return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Felguard
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") == nil and PQR_IsCastingSpell(30146) == false and GetItemCount("Soul Shard") >= 1 then if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then RunMacroText("/use Fel Domination") end return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Incinerate
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",71165) and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47838) == false and IsSpellInRange("Incinerate", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Soul Link
DM:Soul Fire GK/D
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",71165) and UnitBuffID("player",63167) and IsSpellInRange("Soul Fire", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47825) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Soul Fire D
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",63167) and IsSpellInRange("Soul Fire", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(47825) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Demonic Empowerment
A:Shadow Bolt (Non Cast)
D:Rain of Fire
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then CastSpellByID(47820) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shadowfury
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then CastSpellByID(47847) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: A:Sead of Corruption (AOE)
Ability.Lua: if IsRightAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: D:Shadowburn
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Shadowburn", "target") == 1 and GetItemCount("Soul Shard") >= 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: DM:Shadow Cleave
DM:Demon Charge
All:Demon Armor
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player",47889) ~= nil then return false else return true end

Ability.Name: Racial:Blood Fury
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end
